tutorial.speak:
B1 is the platform for communicating with members and visitors of your church. It is broken into two main parts:
A website builder where you can create your primary church website or supplimental web content.
And the member portal that provides various ways for users to interact with your church.
This member portal is also available as a mobile app, the B1.church app.
This tutorial provides an overview of the member portal and how to add options to it as an admin. It will reference other tutorials for the details of each.
Some of the navigation options show up automatically when conditions are met. Others need to be manually added by an admin when desired.
